maqras.text: 17|70|aur hamane banee aadam (maanav) ko pradhaanata dee aur unhen thal aur jal mein savaar[1] kiya aur unhen svachchh cheezon se jeevika pradaan kee aur hamane unhen bahut-see un cheezon par pradhaanata dee, jinakee hamane utpatti kee hai.

17|71|jis din ham, sab logon ko unake agranee ke saath bulaayenge, to jinaka karmalekh unake seedhe haath mein diya jaayega, to vahee apana karmalekh padhenge aur unapar dhaage baraabar bhee atyaachaar nahin kiya jaayega.
17|72|aur jo is (sansaar) mein andha[1] rah gaya, to vah aakhirat (paralok) mein bhee andha aur adhik kupath hoga.

17|73|aur (he nabee!) vah (kaafir) sameep tha ki aapako us vahyee se pher den, jo hamane aapakee or bhejee hai, taaki aap hamaare oopar apanee or se koee doosaree baat ghad len aur us samay ve aapako avashy apana mitr bana lete.
17|74|aur yadi ham aapako sudrdh na rakhate, to aap unakee or kuchh na kuchh jhuk jaate.
17|75|tab ham aapako jeevan kee dugunee tatha maran kee doharee yaatana chakhaate. phir aap apane lie hamaare oopar koee sahaayak na paate.
17|76|aur sameep hai ki ve aapako is dharatee (makka) se vichala den, taaki aapako usase nikaal den, tab va aapake pashchaat kuchh hee din rah sakenge.
17|77|ye[1] usake lie niyam raha hai, jise hamane aapase pahale apane rasoolon mein se bheja hai aur aap hamaare niyam mein koee parivartan nahin paayenge.
17|78|aap namaaz kee sthaapana karen, sooryaast se raat ke andhere[1] tak tatha praatah (fajr ke samay) quraan padhiye. vaastav mein, praatah quraan padhana upasthiti ka samay[2] hai.
17|79|tatha aap raat ke kuchh samay jaagie, phir "tahjud[1]" padhiye. ye aapake lie adhik (nafl) hai. sambhav hai aapaka paalanahaar aapako "maqaame mahmood[2]" pradaan kar de.
17|80|aur praarthana karen ki mere paalanahaar! mujhe pravesh[1] de saty ke saath, nikaal saty ke saath tatha mere lie apanee or se sahaayak prabhutv bana de.
17|81|tatha kahie ki saty aa gaya aur asaty dhvast-nirast ho gaya, vaastav mein, asaty ko dhavast-nirast hona hee hai[1].
17|82|aur ham quraan mein se vah cheez utaar rahe hain, jo aarogy tatha daya hai, eemaan vaalon ke lie aur vah atyaachaariyon kee kshati ko hee adhik karata hai.
17|83|aur jab ham maanav par upakaar karate hain, to mukh pher leta hai aur door ho jaata[1] hai tatha jab use duhkh pahunchata hai, to niraash ho jaata hai.
17|84|aap kah den ki pratyek apanee aastha ke anusaar karm kar raha hai, to aapaka paalanahaar hee bhalee-bhaanti jaan raha hai ki kaun adhik seedhee dagar par hai.
17|85|(he nabee!) log aapase rooh[1] ke vishay mein poochhate hain, aap kah den: rooh mere paalanahaar ke aadesh se hai aur tumhen jo gyaan diya gaya, vah bahut thoda hai.
17|86|aur yadi ham chaahen, to vah sab kuchh le jaayen, jo aapakee or hamane vahyee kiya hai, phir aap hamapar apana koee sahaayak nahin paayenge.
17|87|kintu aapake paalanahaar kee daya ke kaaran (ye aapako praapt hai). vaastav mein, usaka pradaan aapapar bahut bada hai.
17|88|aap kah den: yadi sab manushy tatha jinn isapar ekatr ho jaayen ki is quraan ke samaan le aayenge, to isake samaan nahin la sakenge, chaahe ve ek-doosare ke samarthak hee kyon na ho jaayen
17|89|aur hamane logon ke lie is quraan mein pratyek udaaharan vividh shailee mein varnit kiya hai, phir bhee adhiktar logon ne kufr ke siva asveekaar hee kiya hai.
17|90|aur unhonne kahaah ham aapapar kadaapi eemaan nahin laayenge, yahaan tak ki aap hamaare lie dharatee se ek chashma pravaahit kar den.
17|91|athava aapake lie khajoor athava angoor ka koee baag ho, phir usake beech aap naharen pravaahit kar den.
17|92|athava hamapar aakaash ko jaisa aapaka vichaar hai, khand-khand karake gira den ya allaah aur farishton ko saakshaat hamaare saamane le aayen.

17|93|athava aapake lie sone ka ek ghar ho jaaye athava aakaash mein chadh jaayen aur ham aapake chadhane ka bhee kadaapi vishvaas nahin karenge, yahaan tak kee hamapar ek pustak utaar laayen, jise ham padhen. aap kah den ki mera paalanahaar pavitr hai, mainto bas ek rasool (sandeshavaahak) manushy[1] hoon.
17|94|aur nahin roka logon ko ki ve eemaan laayen, jab unake paas maargadarshan[1] aa gaya, parantu isane ki unhonne kahaah kya allaah ne ek manushy ko rasool banaakar bheja hai
17|95|(he nabee!) aap kah den ki yadi dharatee mein farishte nishchint hokar chalate-phirate hote, to ham avashy unapar aakaash se koee farishta rasool banaakar utaarate.
17|96|aap kah den ki mere aur tumhaare beech allaah ka saakshy[1] bahut hai. vaastav mein, vah apane daason (bandon) se soochit, sabako dekhane vaala hai.

17|97|jise allaah supath dikha de, vahee supathagaamee hai aur jise kupath kar de, to aap kadaapi nahin paayenge, unake lie usake siva koee sahaayak aur ham unhen ekatr karenge pralay ke din unake mukhon ke bal, andhe, goonge aur bahare banaakar aur unaka sthaan narak hai, jababhee vah bujhane lagegee, to ham use aur bhadaka denge.

17|98|yahee unaka pratikaar (badala) hai, isalie ki unhonne hamaaree aayaton ke saath kufr kiya aur kahaah kya jab ham asthiyaan aur choor-choor ho jaayenge, to naee utpatti mein punah jeevit kiye jaayenge
